at 398 nm with 330 nm excitation.N 2 adsorption-desorption measurement was performed on a Micrometrics ASAP2020 at 77 K after the sample was degassed at 120 C. then thoroughly vacuum-treated to remove air completely, and then supercritical fluid-grade CO 2 gas was introduced into the reactor until 1 atm.After then 1 mL of deionized water was injected into the reaction cell, which was not in contact with the photocatalyst, and then kept for 60 min to adsorb CO 2 and H 2 O vapor in the dark.The background was collected by using an untreated sample at room temperature (20 C).Approximately 4 mg of the above sample was pressed onto a cell for the ATR-IR test, which
